article.headline: Northwestern 72, Robert Morris 58
article.story: EVANSTON, Ill. (AP) -- Vedran Vukusic scored 25 points and had 10 rebounds and Michael Thompson added 16 points to lead Northwestern to a 72-58 victory over Robert Morris on Wednesday night. Northwestern (5-5) led the entire game and opened with a 19-4 lead. Thompson scored 13 points in the first half for Northwestern on 6-of-7 shooting and Vedran Vukusic added 12 on 5-of-7 shooting. Northwestern went up by 28 points late in the half on Vukusic's basket, making it 42-14. Robert Morris scored the last six points in the first half to cut Northwestern's lead to 42-20. Vukusic made the first two free throws of the second half to put the Wildcats up 44-20, but Robert Morris answered with a 27-6 run. Mark Anderson and Derek Coleman both had seven points in the span for Robert Morris and as a team they had 5 3-pointers in the stretch. Christopher Gooden's 3 cut Northwestern's lead to 50-47 with 10:18 left in the game, but that was the closest Robert Morris got. Coleman scored 16 points for Robert Morris and Chaz McCrommon added 10 points and 11 rebounds.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.
